channel.title: üè¢ University of Toronto on AI Paper Reviews by AI
channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ University of Toronto on AI Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: MMFactory: A Universal Solution Search Engine for Vision-Language Tasks
item.description: MMFactory: A universal framework for vision-language tasks, offering diverse programmatic solutions based on user needs and constraints, outperforming existing methods.

item.title: Wonderland: Navigating 3D Scenes from a Single Image
item.description: Generate wide-scope 3D scenes from single images in a snap!

item.title: Mind the Time: Temporally-Controlled Multi-Event Video Generation
item.description: MinT: Generating coherent videos with precisely timed, multiple events via temporal control, surpassing existing methods.

item.title: AC3D: Analyzing and Improving 3D Camera Control in Video Diffusion Transformers
item.description: AC3D achieves precise 3D camera control in video diffusion transformers by analyzing camera motion’s spectral properties, optimizing pose conditioning, and using a curated dataset of dynamic videos.

item.title: SG-I2V: Self-Guided Trajectory Control in Image-to-Video Generation
item.description: SG-I2V: Zero-shot controllable image-to-video generation using a self-guided approach that leverages pre-trained models for precise object and camera motion control.

item.title: Minimum Entropy Coupling with Bottleneck
item.description: A new lossy compression framework handles reconstruction distribution divergence by integrating a bottleneck, extending minimum entropy coupling and offering guaranteed performance.
